Text.Page:
Sikander is a kind and generous god. When his beloved Isren was slain, our stories say, the life and joy poured out of him.

That he could not save her drove him mad. Mortals are used to helplessness-gods can't abide it.

Sikander raged until he grew weary, then hid himself a great egg. There he sleeps. There he heals.

The mekonaris tire of watching and want to wake him. But we know better. Sikander will heal and wake...in time.
